entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Timezone Tests Fail with TestReadyToRun on Linux in CI #94190
    Future
  • TypeTests.Get, JitInfoTests, and EnumTests Fail with TestReadyToRun #94189
    Future
  • [browser] Improvements for native library linking #94187
    9.0.0
  • Extreme Performance issues using SetMinimumLevel #94186
    Future
  • RuntimeBinder: A field being used after checking it for null #94184
  • `dotnet test` is not running tests for .NETFramework targets #94183
    9.0.0
  • PublishAot doesn't respect TreatWarningsAsErrors #94178
  • Unexpected OOM with GCHeapLimit #94175
  • [browser] Allow `WasmDebugLevel=0` for debug builds #94174
    9.0.0
  • Complex options validation and the OptionsValidator #94173
    9.0.0
  • SequenceReader, TryReadLittleEndian analyzer error issue #94172
  • [ODBC] SSL_read error coming when calling a table valued function #94170
  • [NativeAOT] Hello World app making remote connections? Why? #94165
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization code refactoring #94162
  • Loop Invariant Cause of Perf Drops Of System.Collections.IndexerSet<String>.Span(Size: 512) #94161
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #94157

Closed

  • Application hangs on GC under dotnet 6.0 in linux #93909
  • Non-deterministic codegen in S_P_CoreLib_System_Reflection_Runtime_TypeInfos_RuntimeTypeInfo__GetPropertyImpl #93843
    9.0.0
  • `IListProvider<T>.ToList()` implementations use `list.Add(element)` instead of direct array initialization. #80760
    Future
  • Add profiling events to describe stub code generated by the runtime #10493
    Future
  • The context has expired and can no longer be used #86385
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add LINQ methods: `TryGetFirst` and `TryGetLast` #94164
  • HTTP2: Two remote server tests occasionally timing out in CI #1580
    9.0.0
  • WebApi input and return value of the json automatic conversion problem #94176
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `Remove` method to `PriorityQueue` #93925
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance Single, SingleOrDefault, First, and Last to allow throwing a custom exception. #94153
  • Bring Windows.Storage namespace into System.IO #94092
  • Microsoft ODBC Driver for SQL Server fails with out any error message in the exception #94087
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #88961
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SystemdHelpers.cs #94191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • ARM64: Fix Vector64x2/3/4 API comments. Minor cleanup in AdvSimd. #94188
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase #94185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] use portable timer #94180
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable threading API features #94167
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows #94166
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change Not IsWindows condition to IsLinux on Socket test disable #94163
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • reduce handle table lock contention #94159
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Bump net7 downlevel version to 7.0.14 #94192
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #94082
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x*AndUnzip and LoadVector128x*AndUnzip APIs #94128
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix test returning 100 unconditionally #94146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support IValidatableObject for nested model types in options source gen #94062
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.1
  • Emit/Call member references in new ILGenerator #94116
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Remove BundleLegacy test targeting netcoreapp3.0/3.1 #94118
    area-Single-File
  • JIT: update tail call IR validity checks #94130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94182
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Revert "[automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging'" #94179
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-codeflow
  • enable two HTTP POST tests #94115
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Implement PriorityQueue.Remove #93994
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Delete Interop.PrintDlg.cs file, it was moved to dotnet/winforms #94171
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • hosting windows service helper enhancement #93771
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    area-Meta
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • make Http2_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException test more deterministic #94112
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    os-ios
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionTests #94042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 32 #94056
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Use deferred evaluation in ReadOnlyDictionary.Key/Value collections. #93870
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Pass and return SIMD values in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet tool update` gives unfriendly error and stack on not found #36557
    8.0.2xx

Closed

  • Adding test for ToolPackageDownloader in sdk #34847

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #36547

Merged

  • Declare dependencies for two Extensions.Logging packages #36554
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow ref struct to implement interfaces #7625
  • Expanding ref support #7555
  • Fix nullability rule #7636
  • add speclet disclaimer #7637

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API proposal] Collection expressions: IOperation support #70631
  • Use integration test harness to log outstanding async listeners on exception hit #70628
    17.9 P2
  • Update Blazor template names and unskip CSharpErrorListWeb.ClosedRazorFile #70627
  • Reenable skipped integration tests #70626
    17.9 P2
  • Implement abstract class code fix does not consider nullability for dynamic #70623
    Backlog
  • Label indentation wrong when immediately following if/for without brackets in dotnet format #70622
    Backlog
  • Assert failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundNode.set_TopLevelNullability #70620
  • Make sure that CallerFilePath returns the correct filename, even in case of partial classes, split over different files #70619
    17.9

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34230.130 #70634
  • [API proposal] Collection literals #68687
    17.8
  • Code completion filters are not coming up in XAML #70618
  • "paramref" XML attribute doesn't work with primary constructor params (CS1734) #70509
    17.9
  • `SemanticModel.GetAliasInfo` returns null when non named types are aliased #70269
    17.9
  • required member that hides base required member is not recognized #70520
    17.9
  • Roslyn crashes when accessing exception variable #70483
    17.9
  • Reference highlights all the code for top level statement #52692
    17.6 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Address additional restore changes feedback #70633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Additional clean up around handling of well known attributes #70632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip test, that fails on renamed project template tracked by issue #70627 #70630
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve Hover markdown on 'await' keyword #70629
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid loading attributes for PE symbols for the purpose of getting AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute information. #70625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70624
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to a different Editor API to fix test flakiness #70578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow faster semantic classification for multiple text spans #70595
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add restore support to the language server #70588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not allocate unused fields for primary constructor parameters in a state machine type. #70587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify classification caching checks #70601
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Perform decoding of AttributeUsageAttribute for PE types in PEModule. #70605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove Tiered Compilation opt-out from AnalyzerRunner #70612
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dockerize ASP.NET Core with Angular template #51760
  • Cannot provide a value for property 'AuthenticationService' on type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication.RemoteAuthenticatorView'. There is no registered service of type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication.IRemoteAuthenticationService`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication.RemoteAuthenticationState #51759
  • CacheOutput hides exceptions in Minimal APIs in .NET 8 RC2 #51757
  • Perf regression: caching #51756
  • GetEndpoint is always null and RouteValues is always empty in custom exception handler #51755
  • Merge dotnet/xdt into aspnetcore #51753
  • Exception when doing snapshot in OnPaintSurface #51751
  • Blazor SSR error when rendermode is InteractiveWebAssembly #51749
  • JSONTranscoding: Handling of explicit nulls in JSON #51742
  • Azure Web App Autoscale Instances can't connect to Redis for SignalR - StackExchangeRedis #51740
  • PageTitle not working in Auth default template page #51739
  • Blazor web app template created on dotnet 8.0 using VS2022 Preview has build issues #51738

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, single_query #51720
  • Incorrect warning when classic blazor initializers are present #51370
    9.0-preview1
  • ArgumentNullException is thrown when argument isn't null but empty #23671
    Backlog
  • data-enhance-nav=false is ignored on <svg> elements #51440
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Enhanced Navigation doesn't work inside SVG element #51705
  • Css animations trigger twice on pre-rendered elements in Blazor Web App #51737
  • Blazor WASM significant slower load time in MS Edge Dev #51670
  • An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. AmbiguousMatchException: The request matched multiple endpoints. Matches: FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) FreelanceFusion.Controllers.PostJobController.CreateJob (FreelanceFusion) #51542

PullRequests

Created

  • Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51762
    area-commandlinetools
  • Update SDK version #51761
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix warning message for classic initializer being ignored #51752
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix Navigation for anchor inside <svg> element #51706
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Use ArgumentNullException instead null coalescing #51732
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Show user friendly error when network requests fail #51690
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestUtils #51713
    area-infrastructure
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #51728
    area-infrastructure
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering, .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 9 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Tab Navigation from Initial Page #18440
  • NullReferenceException in ShellItemRendererBase.GetOrCreateFragmentForTab #18439
  • Maui iOS crashes on launch in release mode #18438
  • Labels in collection view are black in .Net 8 for Android #18437
  • Please let WebView support CSS media query ‘prefers-color-scheme' #18436
  • Screenshot dont work on IOS views #18435
  • IAnimationManager not yet set on first page that is navigated to #18433
  • Can't click item or button when scroll ScrollView in IOS #18432
  • .NET 8 regression: Clipping not working on Windows #18430
  • SwipeItems referencing causes crash on Android. #18429
  • Border Background Issue in Android #18427
  • xamarin_find_protocol_wrapper_type #18426
  • mono_aot_corlib_init_method_gshared_mrgctx #18425
  • mini_init_method_rgctx + 1673 (jit-icalls.c:1673) #18424
  • [Windows] Shell flyout template items do not have a margin applied on first show #18423
  • Animation StartDelay property has no effect #18422

Closed

  • maui dev ，in android window is ok ,in ios webview <img src=x.png 。not display ,but use remote url is ok ,why ? #17912
  • MAUI Error APT2096 failed to open APK:Invalid file #17503
  • When debugging on the Android emulator, the thread occasionally interrupts, causing the app to crash. This issue can be consistently reproduced.安卓模拟器调试时线程有时会中断，app闪退，稳定复现 #18097

PullRequests

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leaks in various controls #18434
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm and bring iOS17 tests #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove lookup of JsonTypeMapping via JsonElement #32192
  • ModificationCommand.HandleJson hard-coded to send parameter with relational NULL for non-property partial update #32191
  • Improve AssertSql for non-query tests #32190
  • UpdateSqlGenerator.AppendUpdateColumnValue needs to throw for unimplemented JSON partial update #32186
  • Change partial update JSON path to be be structured instead of a string JSONPATH #32185
  • BUG: AccessViolationException using where expression on decimal in .Net 6, x86 target, Sqlite #32180

Closed

  • Nullable object must have a value error when I try to proyect a nullable navigation property #32181

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.12 to 7.0.13 #32189
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.4 to 3.36.0 #32188
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.1 to 5.1.2 #32187
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108
    blocked
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.58.0 #32140
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove xliff-tasks source link mapping #17661

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop making tools.sh changes during source-build #17664
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Bump darc to fix package version updates #17657

Merged

  • Add font files as allowed for runtime #17662
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Update source build pipeline triggers #17659
  • Update SDK diff baseline #17660
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Do not fetch again in VMR synchronization #17658
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Check out the correct target VMR branch #17656
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Stabilize package versions #17614

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17646
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17642
